title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 514.3 - Electronic eligibility verification system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 514.3 - Electronic eligibility verification system

State Regulations
(a) The department's electronic Medicaid
eligibility verification system is known as EMEVS. Recipient eligibility may be
verified by accessing EMEVS through a Medicaid eligibility terminal (MET) or by
telephone. The procedures for verifying eligibility through the MET or by
telephone are fully explained in the department's publication "New York State

Electronic Medicaid Verification System Provider Manual". The publication is
available by writing to the following office: Electronic Medicaid Eligibility Verification

System

Department of Social Services
40 N. Pearl Street

Albany, NY 12243

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
514.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
